pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Modular Platform for Reproducible Modeling of Species Niches and Distributions // The 'shiny' application 'wallace' is a modular platform for reproducible modeling of species niches and distributions. 'wallace' guides users through a complete analysis, from the acquisition of species occurrence and environmental data to visualizing model predictions on an interactive map, thus bundling complex workflows into a single, streamlined interface.
